bibl.title: The Isionomos or in-wwy.
Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II
bibl.author: DEPAUW, Mark

bibl.note: Collects the demotic material and intergrates it in a survey of the Greek examples (IIIrd century B.C. - IInd century A.D.).
DEPAUW Mark, The Isionomos or in-wwy.

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 85 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 1131-1153.
